name: Walking in the notes : a special promenade across the Park of the Music the Roman Auditorium
description: Today I want to introduce you to one of my favourite places, if not the favourite one, where I find my shelter when I feel tired, depressed, disappointed by the difficulties of everyday life : the Park of the Music. I can easily reach it by walking 5 minutes far from my home and as soon as I enter from the main gate, I feel immediately better, more relaxed, calm, happy. I hope to transmit you the same emotions  I feel by making you walking around and breathing the magic atmosphere of this temple of the Music but also or this shining set of the CineFestival with its celebrities or this austere siege of the most important cultural and scientific festivals gathering the most outstanding lecturers from all over the world.
